get.description: List all tool IDs (including built-in and dynamically registered)
List tools with JSON schema parameters for a provider/model

delete.description: Delete a session and all its data

get.description: Get the todo list for a session

post.description: Analyze the app and create an AGENTS.md file
Fork an existing session at a specific message

get.description: Get the diff that resulted from this user message

post.description: Create and send a new message to a session

get.description: Get a message from a session

post.description: Send a new command to a session
Write a log entry to the server logs

service.description: Service name for the log entry

extra.description: Additional metadata for the log entry

post.description: Show a toast notification in the TUI

messages_page_up.description: Scroll messages up by one page

messages_page_down.description: Scroll messages down by one page

messages_half_page_up.description: Scroll messages up by half page

messages_half_page_down.description: Scroll messages down by half page

description.description: Description of when to use the agent

command.description: Command and arguments to run the MCP server

environment.description: Environment variables to set when running the MCP server

enabled.description: Enable or disable the MCP server on startup

url.description: URL of the remote MCP server

enabled.description: Enable or disable the MCP server on startup

headers.description: Headers to send with the request

$schema.description: JSON schema reference for configuration validation

theme.description: Theme name to use for the interface

share.description: Control sharing behavior:'manual' allows manual sharing via commands, 'auto' enables automatic sharing, 'disabled' disables all sharing

autoshare.description: @deprecated Use 'share' field instead. Share newly created sessions automatically

autoupdate.description: Automatically update to the latest version

disabled_providers.description: Disable providers that are loaded automatically

model.description: Model to use in the format of provider/model, eg anthropic/claude-2

small_model.description: Small model to use for tasks like title generation in the format of provider/model

username.description: Custom username to display in conversations instead of system username

provider.description: Custom provider configurations and model overrides

timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for requests to this provider. Default is 300000 (5 minutes). Set to false to disable timeout.

anyOf.description: Timeout in milliseconds for requests to this provider. Default is 300000 (5 minutes). Set to false to disable timeout.
Disable timeout for this provider entirely.

instructions.description: Additional instruction files or patterns to include

status.description: Current status of the task: pending, in_progress, completed, cancelled

priority.description: Priority level of the task: high, medium, low

id.description: Unique identifier for the todo item
